title: Mufin Finance acquires APM Finvest for Rs 76 cr, aims to create EV financing ecosystem - The Financial Express
content: Mufin Finance acquires APM Finvest for Rs 76 cr, aims to create EV financing ecosystem  The Financial Express
description: Mufin Finance has acquired APM Finvest for over Rs 76 crore to create India's first financing ecosystem for electric vehicles.
